name: Rock Paper Scissors
description:
We've uncovered a long lost computer with a message on the side that reads "Password: RockBeatsScissorsBeatsPaper". Apparently this computer was made to play a simple game of Rock, Paper, Scissors! But is it really that simple? Beat the computer to get the flag!

Luckily, we managed to obtain a compiled python file that runs it!

The computer has been opened to the internet at stuyctf.me:50000
hint: How does the New York Times program their Novice AI?
